ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch in general(was Changes to Root/Snare)
ygData.msgSnippet: No, I don t post on the EQ forums, too much crap to wade through there for my limited dead time at work.  If you think it would generate some intersting
ygData.messageBody:
No, I don't post on the EQ forums, too much crap to wade through there for
my limited "dead time" at work. If you think it would generate some
intersting conversation, by all means post it there. (Just make sure I get
50% of all the royalty checks, hehehe).

I have given a decent amount of though to the repercussions of the "horse"
idea. I don't think it would affect druid's and wiz's too much. They would
not take the place of boats (which I hate too, but thats another story).
They only would go to zones on the the continent you are currently on. I
think they are pretty wedded to their idea of putting distance between
various continents (I somewhat agree with them here, somewhat). The horses
would be limited. Probably only originate in cities and end in outdoor
zones. Perhaps on Antonica (where their is some business for druids/wiz's
porting across the continent), they could be limited to something like a 4
zone radius. Something to keep it from stepping on the porter's toes too
heavily.
